index.title: Unlimited Computers In Private Network With Zero Router.The Power of OmniEdge,High Seurity, High Speed, and High Performance.
index.description: OmniEdge reduces the enterprise connectivity deployment from weeks to minutes, helps customers focusing on their core business, connects and manages their devices from anywhere, anytime.
index.slogan-description: Omniedge's Peer-to-Peer Layer 2 VPN solutions are not only a great and affordable network solution for a small team but also for big companies with thousands of computers all around the world.
index.name: Name

download.title: Download
download.subtitle: Click on the preferred icon for download.

features.highsecurity-desc: P2P MESH networks, encrypted end-to-end by Two-fish, AES128 or ChaCha20 Ciphers, customized authentication and 2FA to achieve dual security confirmation of devices and users with GDPR in mind.
features.highspeed-desc: End-to-end direct connection, latency improved by up to 50%* compared to traditional VPN networks. Zero-config setup allows one click deployment.
features.highperformance-desc: Cross platform compatibility connecting the widest range of OS and IoT devices. Management of all users and equipment on one dashboard. Minimize setup time, resources, costs and maintenance, helping you focus on your business.
features.how-desc: We rebuild the intranet on the internet setup easier and so you can connect your devices in a secure way without
features.download-desc: We currently support various platforms. You can download them here.
features.login-desc-2: email login, security key login and Google login
features.create-desc: We already created a default virtual network for you. However, you can create your own virtual network in just a minute.
features.connectin-desc: Click connect button on our client application
features.comparetitle: What is the difference of OmniEdge
features.comparedesc: No Public IP, No Port Forward, Zero Config, Zero Firewall Rules
features.FeaturePage-subtitle: Makes secure connectivity from weeks to minutes
features.FeaturePage-desc: OmniEdge reduces the enterprise connectivity deployment from weeks to minutes, helps customers focusing on their core business, connects and manages their devices from anywhere, anytime.
features.crossplatform-desc: Users can run the product on different devices, whether the devices are on Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, Linux or routers, or on a variety of different public clouds.
features.dashboard-desc: Users can manage all registered devices on one dashboard, no matter where they are located, with an end-to-end private encrypted network, allowing users to access their own devices.
features.speed-desc: End-to-end direct connection, compared to traditional VPN networks, can improve response by 50%.
features.security-desc: P2P MESH networks, where packets interact directly between devices, use enterprise G-Suite and other authentication to achieve dual security confirmation of devices and users.
features.setup-desc: Set up OmniEdge just in minutes with our apps on any device, you can choose several different methods to activate your devices.
features.maintenanceless-desc: Forget about the labor-intensive system management job, with OMNIEDGE you can focus on your own core business.
features.flvn-desc: Virtual network becomes a virtual office connecting all remote devices by intranet for your team and trusted users only.
features.flrm-desc: Control a remote computer as if it’s located in front of you, by Remote Desktop Protocol, VNC or SSH.
features.flcr-desc: Connect multiple platforms, Windows,macOS, iOS, Android, Linux and more.
features.flsb-dsec: Sub router allows you connect your devices which is not with Omniedge installed.
features.flbd-desc: Big-data transfer functionality allows international enterprises to exchange data between different sites across their global footprint.
features.flmu-desc: Organize your users to bring secure connection to enterprise's access and resources.
features.flsk-desc: Security Keys allow you connect your linux based devices with only a command line, turning your own devices into an industrial router.
features.flp2p-desc: Traffic over OmniEdge is end-to-end encrypted by Twofish/AES128/ChaCha20 cipers' P2P MESH network.
features.fliot-desc: Integrate OmniEdge into your own IoT project or hardware.
features.flzc-desc: No Public IP, No Port Forward,Zero Config, Zero Firewall Rules. All your connectivity in one single click.
features.flokta-desc: Integrate Okta as your SSO provider to use OmniEdge.
features.flapi-desc: Admin API for admin users to have access to the admin dashboard for overview virutal network, devices and network setting.
features.herosubtitle: We’re on a mission to provide reliable, secure, and painless connectivity solutions for anyone who wants to have access to their devices, anywhere, anytime.

customersmap.customersmapsubtitle: We served customers from more than 26 countries & regions.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start for free, then grow with us

faq.title: FAQ
faq.faq-1-q: How long does it take to set up OmniEdge?
faq.faq-1-a: OmniEdge can be set up in 5 minutes or less, by installing OmniEdge Apps for your devices on iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms.
faq.faq-2-q: Is my privacy secure with OmniEdge?
faq.faq-2-a: We take privacy security very seriously. please read our [Privacy Policy](/privacy) for Details.
faq.faq-3-q: How do I change my existing subscription plan?
faq.faq-3-a: If you already have an OmniEdge plan, please contact us to change your plan or your billing period, or you can do it by yourself at the dashboard.
faq.faq-4-a: Our plans are generally prepaid, so you pay for them in advance. Annual Enterprise plans can be invoiced with net 30 payment terms upon request.
faq.faq-5-q: What payment methods do you offer?
faq.faq-5-a: We support payment by credit card through [Stripe](https://stripe.com). Customers with Enterprise plans can request payment by other methods, such as wire or ACH. At this time, we can only receive payment in US Dollars ($).
faq.faq-6-q: Where are the term of service and privacy policy?
faq.faq-6-a: View the OmniEdge [Terms of Service](/terms) and [Privacy Policy](/privacy).
faq.faq-7-q: How can I learn more about OmniEdge?
faq.faq-7-a: Learn more about OmniEdge by reading [documentation](/doc).
